amendment.description: To require a GAO review and report on certain projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5066 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5066 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 4979. (consideration: CR S5742-5743) To require a GAO review and report on certain projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5066 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 4979.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5066 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
